title: Mixing Moisturizer Into Concealer - How to Make Concealer Look Natural
text: Moisturizers That Will Never Make You Look Shiny However, this trick isn't a fit for all concealers. "I would not recommend this technique with a concealer that is already very hydrating or creamy, like YSL Touche Eclat or NARS Radiant Creamy ," she says. "It will break the product down too much and you won't get the benefit of coverage." Bartlett's favorite concealer-moisturizer cocktail is MAC's Studio Finish and Kieh's Ultra Facial Cream . "The emollient moisturizer mixed with the full coverage matte concealer yields a medium coverage that melts into skin beautifully." Additionally, if your skin is very dry or flaking, Bartlett recommends dipping some moisturizer on a Beautyblender , dipping it into concealer then dabbing it onto your skin.
